H0.text: To digest food is the role of the kidneys in the excretory system.

H1.text: To remove toxins is the role of the kidneys in the excretory system.

H2.text: To produce bile is the role of the kidneys in the excretory system.

H3.text: To oxygenate blood is the role of the kidneys in the excretory system.

A4.text: The kidneys excrete a variety of waste products produced by metabolism into the urine.

A5.text: The kidney participates in the control of the volume of various body fluids, fluid osmolality, acidâ€“base balance, various electrolyte concentrations, and removal of toxins.
